Posts.Title: For women undergoing chemo treatments- possible FREE house cleaning once every 4 months is offered-

Posts.Content: Has to do with the Meiosis level of normal cell divisions  that can go arreye and end up with cancer cells ploidity changing to wild and partial DNA strands and wild cells that end up not responding as well to other drugs and methods, same in prostate cancer and explans why it gets crazier to control for many later on. They have identified two areas to fix this and lead to stopping the cancer cells from progression and thus cell death for them and not for your normal cells...as I barely understand the whole thing, it is complex.
